title: Vertical line
text: The x-coordinate of both points is $$1$$. Therefore it is a vertical line.
speech: The x-coordinate of both points is  1 . Therefore it is a vertical line.
pacedSpeech: The x-coordinate of both points is   1
. Therefore it is a vertical line.

title: Writing the equation
